price: I spominji Gospodara svoga u sebi, ponizno i sa strahopoštovanjem i ne podižući jako glas - ujutro i navečer, i ne budi među nemarnima.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُر رَّبَّكَ فِي نَفۡسِكَ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخِيفَةٗ وَدُونَ ٱلۡجَهۡرِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡأٓصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡغَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur rabbaka fī nafsika taḍarruʿan wakhīfatan wadūna al-jahri mina al-qawli bil-ghuduwi wal-āṣāli walā takun mina al-ghāfilīna
